subject: Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals Upgrade Kit
description_text:
Dear Simsonn


I am the owner of the Pro X pedal set and I noticed that the new Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals Upgrade Kit has been released.


I would like to know if the brake damper has been changed or improved compared to the one currently installed on my pedal set, or if it remains the same.


Thank you in advance for your support.


Best regards,

conversations.body_text: Hi vito rebaudo,     The ProX upgrade kit has been improved with a new damping material that offers better elasticity. The 8-stage damping system has been upgraded to a lighter version, allowing smooth compression and rebound across all 8 levels. Additionally, the kit now features a true hydraulic damper instead of a gas spring, delivering a more realistic racing pedal feel.Â   https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-x-ultra-pedals-upgrade-kit
